conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D transformation with isometric projection.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall thickness. Geometry is clean and consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout failure. The bathroom was moved from a central island to a corner. The stairs were moved to the center. Room adjacencies and proportions are heavily distorted compared to the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is present but does not follow the kitchen/dining/living logic defined in the source (e.g., a bedroom area added which wasn't in the plan).

visual_clarity.notes: High rendering quality, but internal text 'SAMPLE FLOOOR PLAN' on the wall deducts presentation points.

detected_errors.description: Bathroom moved from center of floor plan to an exterior corner wall.
Staircase relocated to central room, breaking the original layout flow.
Text contamination on the interior wall surface.

summary: While the 3D rendering quality is high, the model fails significantly on geometric fidelity, relocating major structural elements like the bathroom and stairs.
